thread.title: AllPepole Media Player can play all kinds of media files
thread.title_full: AllPepole Media Player can play all kinds of media files

title: AllPepole Media Player can play all kinds of media files
text: AllPepole Media Player can play all kinds of media files , 12 October 2015 -- AllPepole gives you the ability to play all kinds of media files right on your Windows computer and Mac computer with no conversions required. The list of supported formats is extensive, and the many customization options let you watch your videos exactly the way that you want to. AllPepole Video Player is a free multimedia player with popular video and audio codecs built-in. AllPepole Video Player supports file formats such as AVI, DAT, MPEG, DivX, XviD, WMV, and ASF and so on. Users don't have to install codecs separately. AllPepole Video Player is capable of playing incomplete or damaged AVI files by skipping the damaged frames. It can also play locked or partially downloaded files. Its other features include drag-and-drop support, HTTP streaming, editable skins, subtitling, overlay mixer, key remapping, enhanced filter rendering, real-time index rebuilding for any video files and Unicode support among others. Main Functions: 1. Supports all media formats, such as Audio \ Video, Pictures, etc.; 2. One key Make instant snapshot when Playing Video, Get the classical picture; 3. Editing favorite picture animation; 4. Merge audio, video, and pictures, audio and video files to generate, beautiful pictures and adds dynamic; 5. Highlighted all pictures in Picture Wall; 6. Show and Drag the pictures in touching mode. AllPepole Media Player is a favorite of many video watchers thanks to abundant format support, style, and customization options. There aren't many videos this app can't play and play amazingly well. It's more than enough to be the only Video Player for Mac you'll ever need on your computer. # # #
